name.str: ECWCS Gen III Level V soft-shell jacket

description: A lightweight, comfortable soft-shell jacket; manufactured by Tennier Industries.  This jacket is part of the third generation of the ECWCS (Extended Cold Weather Clothing System): a layered-clothing system employed by the U.S. Army, designed to protect soldiers from extreme-cold and/or wet conditions.  The jacket features two sleeve pockets and two chest pockets; you can keep your hands warm in the chest pockets.  It also has a hood that folds into the collar, as well as armpit zippers for managing heat and moisture ventilation.

notes: chest length doubled for circumference
thickness presumed based on the fact that it's meant to be part of a layered cold-weather system
trim is to account for the volume of the hood
